name: change_alarm_state
description: Changes an alarm's state or bulk changes all alarms' state.

alarm_type.description: Type of the alarm to be modified.

time_of_day.description: Time of the day of the alarm.

am_pm_or_unknown.description: One of AM, PM or UNKNOWN.

state_operation.description: Operation to change the alarm state.

date.description: The date of the alarm to be modified.

start_date.description: Filter for alarm scheduled to fire on or after this date.

end_date.description: Filter for alarm scheduled to fire on or before this date.

bulk_operation.description: Whether to perform a bulk operation on all alarms.

name: change_timer_state
description: Changes timers' state such as to resume, pause, reset, cancel, delete, stop, dismiss etc.

duration.description: Duration of the timer that should be modified.

label.description: The label of the timer that should be modified.

state_operation.description: Operation to change the timer state.

bulk_operation.description: Whether to perform a bulk operation on all timers.

name: create_alarm
description:
Create a new alarm.

This method can:
1) Create an alarm with a given duration. (For example, set an alarm for 15 minutes.)
2) Create an alarm at a specific time of the day. (For example, set an alarm at 10:30am.)

duration.description: Duration of the alarm, in the format such as e.g. 5h30m20s, 10m, 2m15s, etc.

time.description: Time of the day that the alarm should fire, in 12-hour format "H[:M[:S]]", e.g. "11:20".

date.description: Scheduled date in format of YYYY-MM-DD.

recurrence.description: Should be one or more of SUNDAY, MONDAY, TUESDAY, etc.

name: create_clock
description: Creates a clock object which can either be a timer or an alarm.

type.description: Type of the clock component. Either TIMER or ALARM.

duration.description: Duration of the timer or alarm.

time_of_day.description: Time of the day in HH:MM:SS format.

am_pm_or_unknown.description: One of AM, PM, or UNKNOWN.

date.description: Scheduled date in format of YYYY-MM-DD.

label.description: Label of the timer or alarm.

name: create_timer
description:
Create a new timer.

This method can:
1) Create a timer with a given duration. (For example, set a timer for 10 minutes.)
2) Create a timer for a specific time. (For example, set a timer to go off at 10:30.)

duration.description: Duration of the timer, in the format such as e.g. 5h30m20s, 10m, 2m15s, etc.

time.description: Time of the day that the timer should fire, in 12-hour format "H[:M[:S]]".

label.description: Label of the timer, if meaningful.

name: modify_alarm
description: Modifies when alarm(s) should go off.

query.description: Alarm's time of day or label.

alarm_type.description: Type of the alarm to be modified.

new_time_of_day.description: The new time of the day.

new_am_pm_or_unknown.description: One of AM, PM or UNKNOWN.

new_label.description: The new label to be updated to.

duration_to_add.description: The duration to add to the current alarm.

date.description: The alarm with the date that should modify for.

new_date.description: The new date that the alarm should be updated to.

bulk_operation.description: Whether to perform a bulk operation on all alarms.

name: modify_alarm_v2
description: Modifies an alarm or multiple alarms' label, time, or state.

filters.description: Filters to identify the existing alarms that need to be modified.

modifications.description: Modifications to make to the existing alarms.

bulk_operation.description: Set to true ONLY when the user clearly wants to modify multiple alarms.

query.description: Either the duration or the label of the timer.

new_duration.description: New duration that the timer should be updated to.

duration_to_add.description: The duration to add to the current timer.

new_label.description: The new label to be updated to.

bulk_operation.description: Whether to perform a bulk operation on all timers.

name: modify_timer_v2
description: Modifies a timer or multiple timers' label, duration, or state.

filters.description: Filters to identify the existing timers that need to be modified.

modifications.description: Modifications to make to the existing timers.

bulk_operation.description: Only true when the user wants to perform a bulk operation on all timers.

name: show_matching_alarms
description: Shows the matching alarms to the user.

query.description: Either the exact time or the label of the alarm.

alarm_type.description: Type of the alarm to show (UPCOMING, DISABLED, ACTIVE).

date.description: The date to show alarms for.

start_date.description: Filter for alarm scheduled to fire on or after this date.

end_date.description: Filter for alarm scheduled to fire on or before this date.

name: show_matching_timers
description: Shows the matching timers to the user.

query.description: Either the duration, time_of_day, or the label of the timer.

timer_type.description: Type of the timer to show (UPCOMING, PAUSED, RUNNING).

timer_ids.description: The ids of the timers to be shown to the user.

name: show_stopwatch
description: Opens the stopwatch app to show the state of the stopwatch.

name: snooze
description: Snoozes an alarm that is firing.

time.description: The time to snooze until, in 12-hour format "H[:M[:S]]".

duration.description: Duration to snooze the alarm, in seconds.

name: snooze_alarm
description: Snoozes an alarm that has fired.

snooze_duration.description: Duration to snooze the alarm in seconds.

snooze_till_time_of_day.description: The time of day to snooze the alarm until.

am_pm_or_unknown.description: One of AM, PM or UNKNOWN.
